entry.title: New Replacement Battery Compatible For iPhone 8
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 22.99

You have an iPhone 8 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your iPhone 8 shuts down unexpectedly ?

Your cell phone only works when the battery is plugged in ?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new iPhone 8 replacement battery.

The battery in your iPhone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

Â 

Our batteries are produced with the same quality standard as original Apple iPhone batteries. The iPhone 8 replacement battery power is rated at 1821 mAh (6.96 Wh).

After this easy battery repair, it will have the same battery health as when your iPhone 8 was new.

The battery life will last long enough for up 14 hours of talk time.

Â 

  • Zero cycle count
  • UN38.3, MSDS, ROHS, CE Certification
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • Less than 20 minutes to replace
  • Adhesive strips are included
  • 1-Year Warranty

Â 

Compatibility

This lithium ion battery battery is only compatible with an iPhone 8.

Â 

Warranty

The Replacement iPhone 8 Battery comes with 1-year warranty, as with all the other iPhone battery Replacement Parts.
